contentList.content: Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Wisdom based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is increased by [1].

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage, basic <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DARKVISION">Darkvision</LSTag>, and the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ScorchingRay_AsmodeusTiefling">Scorching Ray</LSTag> once per combat.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage, basic <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DARKVISION">Darkvision</LSTag>, and the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BurningHands_MephistophelesTiefling">Burning Hands</LSTag> once per combat.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage, basic <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DARKVISION">Darkvision</LSTag>, and the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_HeatMetal_ZarielTiefling">Heat Metal</LSTag> once per combat.

Gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="SuperiorDarkvision">Superior Darkvision</LSTag>, the ability to see within magical darkness, and the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Silence_Lolth">Silence</LSTag> once per combat. Your time in the underdark has made your eyes highly capable within the absence of light, and as such, while shrouded in total darkness you will make all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Your vision has been blessed by the Absolute, nullifying your natural aversion to light.

Gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="SuperiorDarkvision">Superior Darkvision</LSTag>, the ability to see within magical darkness, and the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MistyStep_Seldarine">Misty Step</LSTag> once per combat. Your time in the underdark has made your eyes highly capable within the absence of light, and as such, while shrouded in total darkness you will make all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Gain a +2 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Gain a +2 bonus to all damage dealt with weapons.

Gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="SuperiorDarkvision">Superior Darkvision</LSTag>, the ability to see within magical darkness, and the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Enlarge_Duergar">Enlarge</LSTag> once per combat. Your time in the underdark has made your eyes highly capable within the absence of light, and as such, while shrouded in total darkness you will make all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

Make yourself larger. Your weapon and unarmed attacks deal an additional +[1] damage. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain a +1 bonus to Initiative, as well as <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Wisdom based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Gain a +1 bonus to Initiative, as well as [1] of additional <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>.
Gain a +1 bonus to Initiative, as well as <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Darkvision">Darkvision</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Dexterity based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Constitution based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is increased by 2.

Gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PETPAL">Speak With Animals</LSTag> at all times, as well as the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DominateBeast_ForestGnome">Dominate Beast</LSTag> once per combat.

Gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="SuperiorDarkvision">Superior Darkvision</LSTag>, the ability to see within magical darkness, and the ability to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Invisibility_DeepGnome">Invisibility</LSTag> once per combat. Your time in the underdark has made your eyes highly capable within the absence of light, and as such, while shrouded in total darkness you will make all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Condition ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Acid damage and the ability to spew <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Acid">Acid Breath</LSTag>. At levels 5 and 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry grows.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Lightning damage and the ability to spew <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Lightning">Lightning Breath</LSTag>. At levels 5 and 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry grows.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Poison damage and the ability to spew <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Poison">Poison Breath</LSTag>. At levels 5 and 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry grows.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Acid damage and the ability to spew <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Superior_Acid">Superior Acid Breath</LSTag>.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Poison damage and the ability to spew <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Superior_Poison">Superior Poison Breath</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Fire damage and the ability to spew <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Superior_Fire">Superior Fire Breath</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Cold damage and the ability to spew <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Superior_Cold">Superior Frost Breath</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Cold damage and the ability to spew <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Superior_Cold">Superior Frost Breath</LSTag>.
These dragonborn share the rich purple visage and gravity-manipulating breath of amethyst dragons.
These dragonborn share the refractive white scales and shimmering breath of crystal dragons.
These dragonborn share the vibrant veridian scales and psionic breath of emerald dragons.
These dragonborn share the crystalline azure scales and thundrous sonic breath of sapphire dragons.
These dragonborn share the faceted amber scales and desiccating breath of topaz dragons.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Force damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Force">Singularity Breath</LSTag>. At levels 5 and 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry grows.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Force damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Greater_Force">Greater Singularity Breath</LSTag>. At level 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry will reach its full potential.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Force damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Superior_Force">Superior Singularity Breath</LSTag>.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Radiant">Scintillating Breath</LSTag>. At levels 5 and 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry grows.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Greater_Radiant">Greater Scintillating Breath</LSTag>. At level 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry will reach its full potential.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Radiant damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Superior_Radiant">Superior Scintillating Breath</LSTag>.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Psychic damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Psychic">Psionic Breath</LSTag>. At levels 5 and 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry grows.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Psychic damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Greater_Psychic">Greater Psionic Breath</LSTag>. At level 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry will reach its full potential.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Psychic damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Superior_Psychic">Superior Psionic Breath</LSTag>.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Thunder damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Thunder">Sonic Breath</LSTag>. At levels 5 and 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry grows.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Thunder damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Greater_Thunder">Greater Sonic Breath</LSTag>. At level 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry will reach its full potential.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Thunder damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Superior_Thunder">Superior Sonic Breath</LSTag>.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Necrotic">Desiccating Breath</LSTag>. At levels 5 and 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry grows.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Greater_Necrotic">Greater Desiccating Breath</LSTag>. At level 9, the strength of your Draconic Ancestry will reach its full potential.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Necrotic damage and the ability to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_BreathWeapon_Superior_Necrotic">Superior Desiccating Breath</LSTag>.
Unleash a pulse of gravitational force.
Unleash a flash of radiant energy.
Exhale a wave of psychic dissonance.
Unleash a burst of sonic energy.
Exhale a cloud of necrotic fumes.
Gain a +1 bonus to Initiative, as well as <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Strength based <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage and basic <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DARKVISION">Darkvision</LSTag>.

Your time in the underdark has left your eyes sensitive to the light, and as such, while in unobscured areas you will suffer <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

Your time in the underdark has left your eyes accustomed to the dark, and as such, while in heavily obscured areas you will make all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Gain the ability to see normally in darkness up to a distance of [1].
Gain the ability to see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, to a distance of [1].
Gain the ability to see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, to a distance of [1].

This creature is considered to be far more dangerous than what you typically encounter.

When recovering from a Lockdown Condition, they gain status immunity to all lockdown conditions for three turns.

This creature exudes an aura of power. Encountering them in combat can easily prove fatal.

When recovering from a Lockdown Condition, they gain status immunity to all lockdown conditions for three turns.
Affected creature has status immunity to all <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOCKDOWN_CONDITION_DESCRIPTION">Lockdown Conditions</LSTag>.
Lockdown conditions consist of any status effects which would prevent a creature from taking their <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>.
This creature is able to float effortlessly. As such, it is unaffected by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> and takes no damage when falling.

This creature can perform a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Multiattack_Cloaker">Multiattack</LSTag> if their target is suffering from a fear based status effect. Upon dealing damage, they may cause their target to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
Upon dealing damage, this creature may cause their target to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZED">Dazed</LSTag>.
This creature's march is unstoppable. They have status immunity to anything which would restrain them or reduce their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>.
This creature has status immunity to all curses.
This creature is incorporeal. They may be walked through, projectiles may be shot through them, and they can not be forcibly moved. Additionally, attacks of opportunity may not be made against them.
When dealing damage, create a [1] shockwave which reverberates through all targets Large or smaller, dealing [2] and potentially throwing them back by [3].
Upon landing a killing blow upon another creature, Gnolls erupt in a state of utter bloodlust. For three turns after, they make all damage rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Affected creature makes all damage rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

Offer a fragment of a creature's soul to Yeenoghu, preventing them from using <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Actions</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag>.
Affected creature cannot use <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Actions</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag>.
Gorge on a corpse of the fallen to regain <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.

Hook Horrors can make a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Multiattack_HookHorror">Multiattack</LSTag> if their target is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Terrified</LSTag>. Upon dealing damage while unobscured, they potentially Terrify their target.

Aim two attacks at a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Terrified</LSTag> target and possibly make them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleed</LSTag>.
Leap at a target, damaging any nearby creatures that are Large or smaller, and possibly knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
The queen is enraged! She's gained an additional <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>!
Upon being damaged, the Spider Queen will create one Phase Spiderling.
At the beginning of each of their turns, gremishka will always trigger a sudden burst of truly random Wild Magic.
While unubscured, Displacer Beasts may cause their targets to go <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS">Mad</LSTag> when dealing damage to them.

Upon dealing damage to a creature who is not a plant, Myconid potentially implant <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TIMMASK_SPORES">Timmask Spores</LSTag> into their target, unless they or their target are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>.
Root yourself to the ground in magically hardened <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MUD_MANTLE_WOODWOAD">Mud</LSTag>. A [1] area of mud is created around you upon casting.

Affected creature is covered in magically hardened mud. The creatures Armour Class increases by 4. Additionally, the creature cannot Burn, and they become Resistant to Fire damage.

Removed if Wet.
Upon starting it's turn, this little frog will erupt in an electrical current, dealing [1] to two enemies within [2].
This creature rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Dexterity based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
This creature will become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Terrified</LSTag> when hurt.
Affected creature must succeed a Wisdom based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> every turn or be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LURING_SONG">Lured</LSTag> by the nearby Harpy's song.

Affected creature has been attracted to a nearby harpy's luring melody.

The affected creature will use their turn to move closer to the harpy, allowing her to make multiple attacks each turn!

Affected creature has succeeded a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against the nearby harpy's <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_LuringSong_Harpy">Luring Song</LSTag> and is immune to its effects for [1] turns.
Upon starting their first turn in combat, Ghislev will begin chanting, offering you as a sacrifice to Bhaal.
Affected creature is preparing to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_SteelWatcher_Biped_SelfDestructExplosion">Self-Detonate</LSTag>.
Affected creature is preparing to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_SteelWatcher_Quadruped_SelfDestructExplosion">Self-Detonate</LSTag>.
Affected creature can only be harmed by an attack dealing at least [1] damage.
Gain the ability to summon a violent Worg companion. Your companion grows in strength alongside you as you level.
Call forth a violent Worg to tear through your enemies.

As the leader of the pack, this creature will potentially let out a desperate, rallying <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GOBLINWARCRY">Warcry</LSTag> when beginning their turn with no <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag>.
Let out a desperate, rallying <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GOBLINWARCRY">Warcry</LSTag> to embolden you and your allies.
When dealing damage with a weapon, you deal an additional [1].
You may make an additional weapon attack per turn, though the second attack is rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
When damaging a creature larger than you, you deal an additional [1].
Consume fragments of a creature's mind. If your targets Intelligence is below 4, it takes double the damage and is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag>.
Affected creature's Intelligence is reduced by [1].
Your skin is nearly indomitable to standard methods of attack, providing natural <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all forms of physical damage.
Gain the ability to summon a skeletal beast companion. Your companion grows in strength alongside you as you level.
Call forth a skeletal beast to rip through your enemies.
When attacked from outside of it's view, this turret will shut down until the beginning of it's next turn.
When damaged, or upon witnessing the death of a family member, this Owlbear may become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FOR_OWLBEAR_ENRAGE_HARDCORE">Enraged</LSTag>.

Affected creature is enraged! It has gained <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all forms of damage and makes all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
While Lightly or Heavily Obscured, shadow mastiffs are <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.
Possibly drain a creature's <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> by 8. The creature dies if their Hit Points are reduced to 0.
Affected creature's maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> have been reduced by 8 per stack of this condition. They will die if their maximum Hit Points are reduced to 0.
While in direct light, this creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
You are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZED">Dazed</LSTag> from the crash of the nautiloid.

You gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>. When attacked, you can use a Reaction in order to counterattack, making a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> against your aggressor which deals an additional [1].
Make a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag> against your aggressor which deals an additional [1].
While obscured in darkness, you reflect all Radiant damage back at your attacker twofold as Force damage.
Surround yourself in a pillar of Selûne's light, dealing damage to and afflicting nearby foes with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_HOLY">Holy Flames</LSTag>.
Affected creature is blessed by moonlight. Enemies within [1] of them will be afflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_HOLY">Holy Flames</LSTag>.
Fire a mote of moonlight that spills roiling <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_HOLY">Holy Fire</LSTag> in a [1] radius where it impacts.
Engulf your weapon in Selûne's light, dealing additional Radiant damage and surrounding your target in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_HOLY">Holy Flames</LSTag>.
